message_1:
Consider the following statement: "If Alex studies for at least 5 hours every day, then he will get an A in his math exam." 

Now suppose that on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday, Alex studied for 6, 7, 4, and 8 hours, respectively. On Friday, Alex did not study at all. Did he get an A in his math exam? Answer in "yes" or "no" and provide a logical explanation for your answer.
message_2:
no

The statement says that Alex needs to study for at least 5 hours every day to get an A in his math exam. However, on Wednesday, he studied for only 4 hours, and on Friday, he did not study at all. Since he did not meet the condition of studying for at least 5 hours every day, we cannot conclude that he will get an A in his math exam.
